card.name: No Coming Back
card.text: When this enchantment enters, put a finality counter on each creature. (If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.) Each creature enters with an additional finality counter.

card.name: Make Your Dream Real
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Star of Predation
card.text: Destroy target land. Create a 20/20 green Horror Elemental creature token with vigilance and ward {20}. (Whenever that permanent becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {20}.)

card.name: Endless Seas
Chirat, Chronomancer
card.text: Flying Baroque— Whenever you cast a spell, if at least five {U} was spent to cast it, take an extra turn after this one. This ability only trigger once each turn, and only during your turn. You can't cast spells during extra turns.

card.name: Sudden Redirection
card.text: Gain control of target triggered or activated ability. You may choose new target for it. Refrain 2 — {3}{R}{R} (If you cast this spell for {3}{R}{R}, copy it two times. You may choose new target for the copies.)

card.name: Penitent Sinner
card.text: Menace Whenever a player cast a spell that's one or more colors, they lose 1 life for each of that's spell's color.

card.name: Heartless Betrayal
card.text: Gain control of target creature with mana value X or less. Baroque— If at least five {U} was spent to cast this spell, create a token copy of that creature. If at least five {B} was spent to cast this spell, destroy up to one other target creature.

card.name: Mourning Combattant
card.text: Menace Whenever this creature attacks, it gains +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you've lost this turn.

card.name: Glorious Slayer
card.text: Trample, reach Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that target this creature, you may change this creature's base power to 1 plus the greatest toughness among creature your opponent control, and its base toughness to 1 plus the greatest power among creature your opponent control both until end of turn.

card.name: Strategic Surrender
card.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature loses all abilities, and can't attack or block.

card.name: Bane of the Azure Seas
card.text: Ward—Tap a permanent you control and put eight stun counter on it. Baroque — Whenever you cast a spell, if at least five {U} was spent to cast it, choose up to eight. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Tap target nonland permanent you don't control • Put a stun counter on target nonland permanent.

card.name: Ayed, Weary Traveler
card.text: Vigilance Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell targeting this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature for each differently named lands you control.

card.name: Magic Circle: Drei
card.text: No two mana spent to cast this spell may be the same color. For each color of mana spent this way: • {W}: You gain 3 life. • {U}: Scry 3, then draw a card. • {B}: Each opponent loses 3 life. • {R}: Create three 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens. • {G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to three creatures you control.

card.name: Strategic Council
card.text: Exile the top X cards of your library. You may play one of those cards until the end of your next turn. Baroque — If at least five {R} was spent to cast this spell, spell cast this way may be cast without paying its mana cost. If at least five {U} was spent to cast this spell, put up to two cards exiled by this spell into your hand.

card.name: Dawngrove Unicorn
card.text: Lifelink Baroque — Whenever you cast a spell, if at least {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} was spent to cast it, this creature gets +4/+4 and gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Ethelred, the Dealmaker
card.text: Ward—Discard six cards. At the beginning of your upkeep, each player draws seven cards. If they do, they must discard seven cards at the beginning of the next end step. Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +X/+X, where X is the amount of cards in the defending player's hand.

card.name: Pay the Devil's Due
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter) I — Whenever a Pirate or Rogue creature you control deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card and lose 1 life. II — If you have five or more cards in hand, create a 3/3 black Demon Rogue creature token with flying III — Destroy all non-Demon creature tokens. Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed. --- (Back): Secret Blackmarket

card.name: Secret Blackmarket
card.text: This land enters tapped unless you control a Pirate or Rogue creature. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {UB}{UB}{UB}, {T}: Exile this land, then return it on the battlefield (front face up). Activate only as a sorcery. --- (Front): Pay the Devil's Due

card.name: Boundless Roads
card.text: {T}: Add {C} Channel — {X}{X}, Discard this card: Search your library for up to X basic lands that share a land type, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Ice Princess
card.text: Vigilance Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell targeting this creature, choose target creature an opponent controls. If it is tapped, put a stun counter on it. Otherwise, tap it.

card.name: Steel Sentinel
card.text: Vigilance, reach Baroque — Whenever you spend at least five mana of the same color or {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast a spell, put two +1/+1 counters on this creature.

card.name: Dreams of Peace
card.text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you. Whenever a player is dealt damage, sacrifice this enchantment.

card.name: Dusk on the Battlefield
card.text: Destroy all non-Army creatures. Amass Soldiers X, where X is the amount of creatures destroyed this way. Each opponent amasses Soldier 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Soldier. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Soldier Army creature token first.)

card.name: Horizon Wanderer
card.text: This creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance as long as you control eight or more lands. Baroque — Whenever you cast a spell, if at least five {G} was spent to cast it, search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Evergreen Canopy
Obnoxious Bard
card.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell targeting this creature, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. Baroque — Whenever you cast a spell, if at least five {R} was spent to cast it, you may have this creature's power and toughness become equal to the number of noncreature, nonland cards in your graveyard until end of turn.

card.name: Dream of Freedom
card.text: Spell you cast can't be countered. At the beginning of your end step, if you haven't cast a spell this turn, sacrifice this enchantment and draw a card.

card.name: Song of the Forest
card.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains vigilance and trample until end of turn. Refrain 2 — {3}{G}{G} (If you cast this spell for {3}{G}{G}, copy it two times. You may choose new target for the copies.)

card.name: Fated Vanguard
card.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell targeting this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on it. The first time this creature attacks each turn, if it has two or more +1/+1 counters, it gains first strike until end of turn. If it has four or more +1/+1 counters, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to it this turn. If it has six or more +1/+1 counters, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase

card.name: Angelic Pity
card.text: Return target creature from your graveyard to the battlefield under your control. Baroque — If at least five {W} was spent to cast this spell, it gains indestructible until your next turn. If at least five {B} was spent to cast this spell, you gain life equal to that creature's mana value.

card.name: Bathin, Demon Mentor
card.text: Flying, trample, menace Baroque — Whenever you cast a spell, if at least five {B} was spent to cast it, you may search your library for a card and put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Bottomless Chasm
Chromatic Storm
card.text: This spell deals 5 damage to target creature. Baroque — If at least five {R} or {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} was spent to cast this spell, add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}.

card.name: Misplaced Girl
card.text: Sacrifice this creature: Creatures you control gains indestructible until end of turn. Baroque — Whenever you cast a spell, if at least five {W} was spent to cast it while this creature is in your graveyard, amass Soldiers 3. (Put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Soldier. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Soldier Army creature token first.)

card.name: Good Night's Rest
card.text: Tap target creature you control and put three stun counters and three +1/+1 counters on it. It has hexproof until it untap. Refrain X — {GW}{GW}{X} (If you cast this spell for {GW}{GW}{X}, copy it X times. You may choose new target for the copies.)

card.name: Traumatized Soldier
card.text: Whenever an opponent cast a spell, this creature deals 1 damage to you. Put a grudge counter on it. {1}{BR}{BR}: Transform this creature. If it has three or more grudge counter, draw a cards. You may only activate this ability once each turn. --- (Back): Ominous Knight

card.name: Ominous Knight
card.text: Menace, trample This creature gets +1/+1 for each grudge counter on it. --- (Front): Traumatized Soldier

card.name: Above the Clouds
card.text: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1. {WU}{WU}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Exile all creatures with flying you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: The Bird's Flight
card.text: (The monarch draws a card at the beginning of their end step. Whenever the monarch is dealt combat damage by a creature, its controller becomes the monarch.) I — Put a flying counter on each Wizard or Noble creature you control. II — Create a Favorable Winds token. (It's a {1}{U} blue enchantment with "creatures you control with flying gets +1/+1) III — You become the monarch. Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed. --- (Back): Regal Pinnace

card.name: Regal Pinnace
card.text: This land enters tapped unless you control a Noble or Wizard creature. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {WU}{WU}{WU}, {T}: Exile this land, then return it on the battlefield (front face up). Activate only as a sorcery. --- (Front): The Bird's Flight

card.name: Into Uneasy Paths
card.text: Target creature must attack if able during its controller's next turn. Refrain 4 — {3}{RW}{RW} (If you cast this spell for {3}{RW}{RW}, copy it four times. You may choose new target for the copies.)

card.name: Army of the Verdant Woods
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters under your control, amass Soldiers 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Soldier. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Soldier Army creature token first.) Army creatures you control have trample.

card.name: Special Move
card.text: Double target creature's power until end of turn. Refrain 2 — {6}{RG}{RG} (If you cast this spell for {6}{RG}{RG}, copy it two times. You may choose new target for the copies.)

card.name: Dormant Monument
card.text: Trample This creature enters with a defender counter on it. Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, remove a defender counter on this creature.

card.name: Final Breath
card.text: Destroy target creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Frontline Summoner
card.text: Haste Baroque — Whenever you cast a spell, if at least five {R} was spent to cast it, create two 3/1 red Elemental creature token with haste, "this creature can't block" and "at the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this creature".

card.name: Battlefield Standard
Xenophobia
card.text: Whenever a creature enters under an opponent's control, you lose 1 life and put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control. Whenever a creature your opponent controls dies, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Veteran Swordmaster
card.text: First strike Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a Equipment card with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Stories of the Realm
card.text: Whenever this artifact enters, choose a color. Create a 1/1 Human creature token of the chosen color. Whenever you attack with three or more creatures sharing the same color, put a page counter on this artifact. {1}, Remove a page counter from this artifact: Draw a card.
